thread.title: Scotty Perkins Joins Fusion Agiletech Partners as Product Innovation Executive

author: cnbc.com
title: Scotty Perkins Joins Fusion Agiletech Partners as Product Innovation Executive
text:
Payments Industry Expert to Drive Blockchain Innovation in Partnership with Microsoft
DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Fusion Agiletech Partners, a Canadian firm, today announced that Scotty Perkins has joined as a member of its executive team. Perkins will also join Quisitive as Senior Vice President of Product Innovation. Perkins is a payments industry and blockchain technology expert.
Perkins will serve in a dual role. As Quisitive’s Senior Vice President of Product Innovation, he will develop Quisitive’s blockchain service capabilities in partnership with Microsoft. In this role, he is responsible for R&D efforts around industry-focused proof of concepts (POCs) across multiple technology areas with heavy emphasis on Microsoft blockchain and the Azure cloud platform. As an executive within Fusion Agiletech Partners, he will also be responsible for the development and growth of LedgerPay, overseeing the company’s suite of financial payments products.
“Scotty brings a wealth of industry knowledge in payments and the technologies that power it,” said Mike Reinhart, Fusion Agiletech CEO. “His leadership skills, industry vision and technological expertise will enhance our ability to build Quisitive into one of the industry’s premier Microsoft consulting firms by 2020.”
Prior to joining Quisitive, Perkins served as Senior Vice President of Retail Operations and Chief Compliance Officer at PayNearMe, where he created the financial design and business architecture for a from-the-ground-up cash payment network, enabling consumers to pay for all types of goods and services using cash at retail locations.
“There’s mounting excitement in the payments space around innovative technologies like blockchain and how it will change the market,” said Perkins. “As a member of both the Fusion Agiletech and Quisitive executive teams, I feel well positioned to help the payments industry evolve and significantly contribute our company’s growth.”
About Fusion Agiletech Partners, Inc.
Fusion Agiletech Partners is building one of North America’s largest capabilities in customer-oriented information technology solutions, specializing in payments, blockchain and transformative technologies, as well as strategy and management consulting. Fusion Agiletech leverages agile software development, cloud and data analytics to enable digital transformation and is a key Microsoft partner. For more information, visit http://fusionagiletech.com/ .
About Quisitive
Quisitive is a full-service digital technology consulting firm, developing solutions that empower organizations to digitally transform their business. Founded by Mike Reinhart, Quisitive serves clients globally with offices in Dallas, TX, Denver, CO, and Toronto, Canada. For more information, visit http://www.Quisitive.com and follow @BeQuisitive, @TheQBlockchain.
